title: Bread and dripping
creator_credit: Margot Nash, Women's Film Collective and Wimins Films
brief_description: The role of the women during the Great Depression has often been neglected in the telling of Australian history. Using archival footage, this film illustrates the hardships and the political struggles women faced in a time of political and economic upheaval.
creator_credit_for_label: Margot Nash, Women’s Film Collective and Wimins Films
